tool_description: Analyzes depreciation policies and calculates normalized depreciation expenses for valuation purposes.

gross_ppe.description: Gross property, plant and equipment value

error_messages: Invalid depreciation values: Accumulated depreciation cannot exceed gross PPE.
Unsupported depreciation method: Method must be one of standard accounting methods.
Negative values: All asset and depreciation values must be non-negative.
Inconsistent data: Annual depreciation should align with accumulated depreciation trends.
usage: Provide asset and depreciation data along with the depreciation method used. Tool analyzes appropriateness and calculates normalized depreciation.

asset_age_ratio.description: Ratio of accumulated to gross depreciation
